duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and represent the company in a positive and professional manner.
Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues in a timely and effective manner.
Navigate computer systems and platforms while engaging in phone conversations with customers.
Communicate effectively in a one-on-one and team environment.
Manage time efficiently and multitask to handle multiple customer interactions.
Maintain a quiet work environment free from background noise to ensure effective communication.
